subject: Television
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Ratings and Rating Systems
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Through Saturday, an average 9.9 million viewers watched each game, up from 9 million last year. For the first time, four networks have been carrying the men’s tournament.
snippet: Through Saturday, an average 9.9 million viewers watched each game, up from 9 million last year. For the first time, four networks have been carrying the men’s tournament.
